Netflix seems to have managed to scare its viewers yet again.

The Netflix original horror ELI is the story of a young boy (Charlie Shotwell) who is the victim of a mysterious unknown illness that requires him to be isolated from the rest of the world.

After exhausting every option, his parents ( Kelly Reilly and Max Martini ) put all they have in the hands of a doctor ( Lili Taylor ) whose cutting edge and experimental treatments at her clean house facility may hold Eli’s last hope.

As Eli undergoes the tremendously intense process that could potentially cure him, he begins to be haunted by experiences that make him question who he can trust and what is lurking inside the house.

Naturally, fans have been left rather shaken by the scary scenes in the horror movie and took to social media to share their reactions.

(Image: Patti Perret/Netflix)

One took to Twitter saying: "i just watched Eli on netflix and i SWEAR im seeing demons out of the corner of my eyes HELP"

Another wrote that it really stayed with them: "Have you watched the Netflix film Eli? I watched it this weekend and I am still thinking about it!"

One fan made a very bold claim: "“Eli” on Netflix rl the scariest movie I ever seen in my life"

Finally, one wrote: "This movie Eli on Netflix is soo good, plot twist is crazy"

However, not everyone is a fan, as one wrote: "If you’re thinking of watching #Eli on Netflix, don’t waste your time. It’s naff."

Guess you'll have to let us know what you think!

ELI is available now on Netflix.

What do you think of Eli? Let us know in the comments below.
description: Netflix horror film ELI has left fans of the streaming service frightened thanks to its chilling scenes
